name.vi: Giấy phép Công cộng Mozilla, phiên bản 1.1
name.ja: Mozilla Public License バージョン 1.1
name.zh-CN: Mozilla 公共许可协议，版本 1.1

release_notes.en-US:
Changes in version 0.5.0.0:
  • Improvement: AddOn now working with Thunderbird 3.1 and Lightning 1.0b2
  • Bugfix: Implemented solution to fix bug from previous version which leads to duplicate entries in calendar
  • Bugfix: Option dialog was sometimes not closed when pressing the accept button
  • Open Bug: Maybe dublicated entries through a sync with google calendar.
Changes in version 0.4.3.0:
  • Bugfix: Added type="child" attribute to addBirthdaysToCalendarOptions.xul to get addon working properly under Linux. Now the prefwindow has got a close and ok button instead of just a close button.
  • Improvement: If syncfunction is called from menu and no adressbook/calendar was set before (default after new installation) the option dialog is opend (cancel button is disabled and hidden in this case).
  • Improvement: If a new birthday is added to addressbook no adressbook/calendar was set before (default after new installation) the option dialog is opend (cancel button is disabled and hidden in this case).
  • Open Bug: If a birthday event was added manually through user interaction or through a syncronization from a pda, the event is not recognized from addon. This is, because the UID of the birthday event is not set to the adressbook entry. If addon is called you will get the birthday event a second time. Solution: before inserting a new birthday event to calendar must be checked, if there is alread an event with the same title, same categorie, same date and so on

description.en-US:
After a addressbook-contact with a registered birthday/anniversary will be saved, a corresponding event will be added to the Lightning-calendar.

You my configure the alarm-function in the add-ons options-pane.

You may import already existing birthdays from your Thunderbird-addressbook to your Lightning-calendar with the help of a new menuitem in the "Events and Tasks"-menu.
description.de:
Sobald ein Adressbuch-Kontakt mit einem Geburtstag gespeichert wird, erfolgt automatisch das Anlegen eines jählichen Serientermins.

Über die Optionen kann die Erinnerungsfunktion ein- und ausgestellt werden. Darüber hinaus lässt sich hier die Alarmfunktion konfigurieren.

Über einen Menüeintrag unter "Termine und Aufgaben" lässt sich der Import von bereits im Adressbuch existierenden Geburtstagen in den Kalender starten.

caption.en-US: If the alarm-option is activated, the Lightning-standard-alarm-function will remind of the birthday...
The Add-on options-dialog. Here you can set which addressbook and which calendar take part...
caption.de:
Der Optionen-Dialog.
Hier lässt sich das Adressbuch / der Kalender auswählen zwischen denen die Geburtstage synchronisiert werden sollen.

caption.en-US: The Add-on-menuitem. Here you can start the import of already existing birthdays stored in the Thunderbird-addressbook.
caption.de: Neuer Menüeintrag: Hier kann die Synchronisation von bereits im Adressbuch existierenden Geburtstagen gestartet werden...

caption.en-US: After the import ist complete a message will inform about the modifications...
caption.de: Nachdem der Import der Geburtstage abgeschlossen ist, informiert ein Pop-Up über die durchgeführten Änderungen...

caption.en-US: The birthday-event in the calendar-month-view. The title reveals the age of the birthday-child...

summary.en-US: Birthdays from addressbook-contacts will be added as events to Lightning...
summary.de: Geburtstage aus dem Adressbuch werden als Termin in Lightning angelegt...
